about_the_game:
Daddy, Say My Name is an erotic linear visual novel that goes where very few other games have gone before. It follows Zeke, a rat programmer who loves DILFs more than anything else. One day, after his friend drags him to a nearby bar, he meets Ron, the hottest and sweetest fellow rat he's ever met. They hit it off immediately and their love grows intense. Unfortunately for them, an awful secret will reveal itself to them and shatter their worlds. Will their love keep them together or will things crumble for these two rodents?





Customize Your Looks

Customize what you wear from feminine to masculine as you control what you say and do to your Daddy.

Be As Kinky As You Want

Engage in as many kinks as you want where you have the option to accept or deny any fetish that comes your way.

Jam To Some Great Rock Music

A rocking soundtrack filled with many Dadrock tunes for those yearning to return to the good ol' days.

* Some features in the full game aren't present in the demo.

content_descriptors.notes: This game depicts explicit sex between father and son, derogatory terms used in a friendly manner, and usage of alcohol. All sex depicted in the game is consensual and between characters over the age of 18.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu / SteamOS
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 210 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6-10.14
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 210 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is non-notarized. May not work with 10.15 Catalina

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 210 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Looks like Daddy isn't the one in charge in this linear erotic visual novel. You're in control and he's willing to do whatever your lustful mind desires. Choose to be fem, masc, both, or neither as you start a forbidden yet steamy relationship with your Dad! Will you two commit to being lovers?
